pages.text: Both the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$() and the automation-based $(l:crafting/runic_crafter)runic crafter$() can be automated with a dispenser containing a knife.$(br2)A redstone signal applied to the dispenser will begin the crafting process, if there is an eligible recipe.$(br2)$(info) As the runic crafter draws ingredients from inventories below it, simple automation of crafting recipes is easy.
The runic crafter will output results to any adjacent inventory in a 3x3 area excluding the one below it.
